name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot, adorned with a retro console box featuring red and black buttons. Its arms and legs are equipped with powerful rocket boosters, giving it incredible agility and speed. The robot's screen displays a vibrant red and black color scheme, reminiscent of classic oscilloscope displays. Volt is a proud member of the WebtrES club, using its advanced technology to explore the digital realm and uncover hidden secrets.
